Text: Oops, in my description I meant to write "Bad Taste and "Dead Alive" by Peter Jackson ("Braindead" is the alternate title for "Dead Alive;" "Brain Dead" is a film with Bill Paxton by a different director).

haha, I love this awesome film!

If you've ever watched 'Neighbours' you've gotta see thgis just to Harold Bishop playing a bad guy- Epic!

A 8 V 8
